biotools.summary: Consists of a HDF5 database back-end for SNPs, a data exchange layer powered by TASSEL libraries that represent data in JSON format, and an interface layer using PHP to visualize SNP information. It displays data in real-time through a web browser in grids that are color-coded according to a given SNP’s allelic status and mutational state.

bioschemas.name: SNPversity
